INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES

ï‚Ÿ Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
ï‚Ÿ Answer one essay question only. You must base your answer on at least two of the Part 3 works
  you have studied. You may include in your answer a discussion of a Part 2 work of the same
  genre if relevant. Answers which are not based on a discussion of at least two Part 3 works will
  not score high marks.
ï‚Ÿ You are not permitted to bring copies of the works you have studied into the examination room.

ï‚Ÿ No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
ï‚Ÿ Elija un tema de redacciÃ³n. Su respuesta deberÃ¡ basarse en al menos dos de las obras
